page.title: 03VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall was used for a school a long time ago.Now the village hall is used for the youth club,guides ,brownies,play group,jumble sales and womens institute. The youth club is used once a week. They have darts, snooker, pool and music.In the play group it is used every morning.The jumble sales are sometimes in the summer and sometimes in the winter.People bring allsorts to be sold and when everything is sold the money is collected and counted and put towards the hall.Every Monday in the village hall they have bingo. If there is a holiday like Bank Holiday Monday or Christmas there is no bingo.In bingo they have raffles. Some people bring things for the raffle.At Christmas they have a big raffle and there are lots of things brought in.
